pages.text: A crystallized shard of restorative energy. Once acquired, this fragment binds permanently to your inventory and provides passive regeneration.

pages.title: Mechanics
pages.text: $(bold)Base Healing:$() 1 HP every 10 seconds$(br2)$(bold)Stacking:$() Each additional fragment reduces healing interval by 0.25 seconds$(br2)$(bold)Minimum Interval:$() 1 second (with many fragments)$(br2)$(bold)Warning:$() $(#f00)Cannot be dropped or moved!$()$(br)Fragments are permanently bound to your inventory. They can only be removed on death.$(br2)$(italic)A blessing... or a curse?$()
